# Treelar's Website

## Overview
Personal website of Treelar, a software developer. The site showcases their projects, skills, and provides links to their social media presence.

## Site Structure

### Pages
- **Home** (https://treelar.xyz/) - Main landing page with bio and introduction
- **Projects** (https://treelar.xyz/projects) - Portfolio of software projects

## About

Treelar is a software developer who writes code and is currently learning Japanese (日本語勉強中).

### Skills & Technologies
- **Frontend Frameworks**: Svelte, React, Vue
- **Operating Systems**: NixOS, macOS

### Social Links
- GitHub: https://github.com/ninjawarrior1337
- Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/treelar.xyz
- Mastodon: https://mastodon.social/@treelar
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/treeelar
- AniList: https://anilist.co/user/Treelar

## Projects

### Hanamaru
A Go-based Discord bot with Japanese-learning utilities and image editing features.
- Go package: https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/ninjawarrior1337/hanamaru-go
- GitHub: https://github.com/ninjawarrior1337/hanamaru-go

### Geta
Split bill calculation app for going to restaurants in the US.
- Website: https://geta.v.treelar.xyz/
- GitHub: https://github.com/ninjawarrior1337/geta

### Ki
A mood tracker inspired by bytesbybianca/mood-tracker, built with the T3 stack.
- Website: https://t3.v.treelar.xyz/
- GitHub: https://github.com/ninjawarrior1337/ki

### Ongaku
An anime openings and endings website inspired by openings.moe, with more up-to-date content.
- Website: https://ongaku.treelar.xyz/
- GitHub: https://github.com/ninjawarrior1337/ongaku

### Boushi
A smartphone-controlled 2D array of LEDs on a graduation cap.
- GitHub: https://github.com/ninjawarrior1337/boushi

### Mari
A peer-to-peer file sharing service utilizing WebRTC with React frontend. A replacement for reep.io.
- Website: https://mari.treelar.cf/
- GitHub: https://github.com/ninjawarrior1337/mari

### Reverse Game
A Mario-like game that started as a level reset concept but became a Mario clone.
- Website: https://fs.treelar.xyz/reverse
- GitHub: https://github.com/ReverseDevTeam/ReverseGame

### lovelive-hd-ur-*
AI upscaled wallpapers for Love Live cards. Originally written to get AI upscaled wallpapers by pressing a button on a phone. Rewritten in 4 different languages (Rust, TypeScript, Kotlin, and Go).
- Rust: https://github.com/ninjawarrior1337/lovelive-hd-ur-rs
- TS/JS: https://github.com/ninjawarrior1337/love-live-hd-ur-server
- Kotlin: https://github.com/ninjawarrior1337/lovelive-hd-ur-server-spring
- Go: https://github.com/ninjawarrior1337/lovelive-hd-ur-go

### llwikiaapi
An API for the Love Live Wikia Page, allowing access to lyrics and song information.
- API: https://llwikia.v.treelar.xyz/

### This Website
The personal portfolio website itself, built with Svelte.
- Source: https://treelar.xyz/

## Contact

The site does not have a dedicated contact page. For inquiries, social media links (GitHub, Bluesky, Mastodon, Twitter) can be used.
